sys_ui_macro.name: datagrid_macroUI
sys_ui_macro.xml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<j:jelly trim="false" xmlns:j="jelly:core" xmlns:g="glide" xmlns:j2="null" xmlns:g2="null">
	<g:evaluate>
		var jellyCount;
		if(jellyCount == undefined){
			jellyCount = 0;	
		}else{
			jellyCount = parseInt(jellyCount + 1);
		}	
	</g:evaluate>
	<j:if test="${jellyCount == 0}">
		<script src="x_vmw_cloudservice.angularJs_1.8.2.jsdbx"></script>	
	</j:if>
	
	<link rel="stylesheet" href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/angularjs-datetime-picker-v2@0.2.2/angularjs-datetime-picker.css" />
 	<script src="x_vmw_cloudservice.angularjs_datetimepic.jsdbx"></script>
 	<script src="x_vmw_cloudservice.datagrid_uiscript.jsdbx" ></script>
	
	<style>
	
	.angularjs-datetime-picker{
		z-index : 10001;	
		width  : 250px;
	}
	.custom-checkbox-wrapper input[type=checkbox]+label::before{
		top: 10rem;
	}
		
	.custom-checkbox-wrapper input[type=checkbox]+label::after{
		top: 10rem;
	}
		
	.span-disabled{
		pointer-events : none;
	}
	
	.cas-pagination-last, .cas-pagination-previoud, .cas-pagination-next, .cas-pagination-first{
		fill : hsl(198, 0%, 20%);
	}
		
	.cursor-class{
		cursor:pointer;
	}
		
	.cas-clr-subtext {
		display: block;
		font-size: 1.2rem;
		line-height: 2rem;
		color: #c92100;
		margin-top: 0rem;
	}
		
	.info-error{
		fill:#c92100;
	}
	
	.cas-clr-input.ng-touched.ng-invalid{
		border-bottom:1px solid #c92100;
	}
		
	.primary-color-clr{
		fill : #0077b8;
	}
	.scrollit {
    overflow-x:auto;
    overflow-y: hidden;
    border:1px solid #ccc;
    border-radius: .125rem;

	}
	.onload-loader{
	  position: relative;
	  top:-30%;
	  text-align: center;
	  color: #777;
	  font-size: 14px;
	  font-weight: lighter;
	  letter-spacing: 1.2px;
	}
	.onload-loader span{
	  animation: blink 1s ease infinite;
	  font-size: 70px;
	  letter-spacing: -10px;
	}

	.onload-loader span:nth-child(1){
	  animation-delay: .2s;
	}
	.onload-loader span:nth-child(2){
	  animation-delay: .4s;
	}
	.onload-loader span:nth-child(3){
	  animation-delay: .6s;
	}

	@keyframes blink{
	  0%{
		opacity:0.2;
	  },
	  100%{
		opacity:1;
	  }
	}


		@-webkit-keyframes clr-progress-fade {
		  0% {
			opacity: 1
		  }
		  to {
			opacity: 0
		  }
		}

		@keyframes clr-progress-fade {
		  0% {
			opacity: 1
		  }
		  to {
			opacity: 0
		  }
		}

		@-webkit-keyframes clr-progress-looper {
		  0% {
			left: -100%
		  }
		  to {
			left: 100%
		  }
		}

		@keyframes clr-progress-looper {
		  0% {
			left: -100%
		  }
		  to {
			left: 100%
		  }
		}

		@-webkit-keyframes spin {
		  0% {
			transform: rotate(0deg)
		  }
		  to {
			transform: rotate(360deg)
		  }
		}

		@keyframes spin {
		  0% {
			transform: rotate(0deg)
		  }
		  to {
			transform: rotate(360deg)
		  }
		}

		.cas-modal {
		  position: fixed;
		  top: 0;
		  bottom: 0;
		  right: 0;
		  left: 0;
		  z-index: 1050;
		  display: -ms-flexbox;
		  display: flex;
		  -ms-flex-direction: column;
		  flex-direction: column;
		  -ms-flex-pack: center;
		  justify-content: center;
		  -ms-flex-align: center;
		  align-items: center;
		  padding: 2rem
		}

		@media screen and (max-width:576px) {
		  .cas-modal {
			padding: .5rem
		  }
		}

		.cas-modal-dialog {
		  position: relative;
		  z-index: 1050;
		  width: 46rem;
		  max-width: 100%
		}

		.cas-modal-dialog.cas-modal-sm {
		  width: 12rem
		}

		.cas-modal-dialog.cas-modal-lg {
		  width: 36rem
		}

		.cas-modal-dialog.cas-modal-xl {
		  width: 48rem
		}

		.cas-modal-dialog .cas-modal-content {
		  padding: 3rem;
		  background-color: #fff;
		  border-radius: .300rem;
		  box-shadow: 0 1px 2px 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, .2)
		}
	
		.cas-modal-header {
		  border-bottom: none;
		  padding: 0 0 1rem
		}

		.cas-modal-header .cas-modal-title {
		  color: #000;
		  font-size:2rem;
		  font-family: Metropolis, "Avenir Next", "Helvetica Neue", Arial, sans-serif;
		  font-weight: 200;
		  line-height: 2rem;
		  letter-spacing: normal;
		  margin: 0;
		  padding: 0 .230rem
		}

		.cas-modal-header .cas-close {
		  margin-top: -0.50rem;
		  margin-right: -.708rem;
		  font-size: 1.0833rem;
		  line-height: 1rem
		}

		.cas-modal-header .cas-close clr-icon {
		  fill: #737373;
		  width: 1rem;
		  height: 1rem
		}

		.cas-modal-body {
		  max-height: 70vh;
		  overflow-y: auto;
		  overflow-x: hidden;
		  padding: 0 .125rem
		}

		.cas-modal-body>:first-child {
		  margin-top: 0
		}

		.cas-modal-body>:last-child {
		  margin-bottom: 0
		}

		.cas-modal-footer {
		  display: -ms-flexbox;
		  display: flex;
		  -ms-flex-pack: end;
		  justify-content: flex-end;
		  padding: 1rem 0 0
		}

		.cas-close {
		  float: right;
		  font-size: 1.5rem
		}

		.cas-close:focus,
		.cas-close:hover {
		  text-decoration: none;
		  cursor: pointer
		}

		button.cas-close {
		  padding: 0;
		  cursor: pointer;
		  background: 0 0;
		  border: 0;
		  -webkit-appearance: none
		}

		.cas-close {
		  transition: color linear .2s;
		  font-weight: 200;
		  text-shadow: none;
		  line-height: inherit;
		  color: #737373;
		  opacity: 1
		}

		.cas-close clr-icon {
		  fill: #737373
		}

		.cas-close:active,
		.cas-close:focus,
		.cas-close:hover {
		  opacity: 1;
		  color: #000
		}

		.cas-close:active clr-icon,
		.cas-close:focus clr-icon,
		.cas-close:hover clr-icon {
		  fill: #000
		}

		.cas-close:focus,
		.cas-clr-checkbox-wrapper input[type=checkbox]:focus+label::before {
		  outline: 0;
		  box-shadow: 0 0 2px 2px #6bc1e3
		}

		.cas-alert .cas-close {
		  width: 1rem;
		  display: block;
		  height: 1.5rem;
		  -ms-flex: 0 0 1.166667rem;
		  flex: 0 0 1.166667rem;
		  -ms-flex-order: 100;
		  order: 100;
		  padding-right: .166667rem
		}

		.cas-alert .cas-close clr-icon {
		  margin-top: -.125rem;
		  height: calc(1rem - 1px);
		  width: calc(1rem - 1px)
		}

		.cas-alert .cas-close~.cas-alert-item>.cas-alert-actions {
		  padding-right: .5rem
		}

		.cas-alert .cas-close~.cas-alert-item>.cas-alert-actions>.cas-alert-action:last-child {
		  margin-right: .5rem
		}

		.cas-alert-app-level .cas-close {
		  color: #fff;
		  opacity: .8;
		  height: 1.5rem;
		  overflow: hidden
		}

		.cas-alert-app-level .cas-close clr-icon {
		  fill: #fff;
		  margin-top: -.208333rem
		}

		.cas-alert-app-level .cas-close:active,
		.cas-alert-app-level .cas-close:focus,
		.cas-alert-app-level .cas-close:hover {
		  opacity: 1
		}
		.cas-modal-footer .cas-btn {
		  margin: 0 0 0 .5rem
		}

		@media screen and (max-width:768px) and (orientation:landscape) {
		  .cas-modal-body {
			max-height: 55vh
		  }
		}

		@media screen and (max-width:576px) {
		  .cas-modal-content {
			padding: .5rem 0 .5rem 1rem
		  }
		  .cas-modal-header {
			padding: 0 1rem .5rem 0
		  }
		  .cas-modal-body {
			max-height: 55vh
		  }
		  .cas-modal-footer {
			padding: .5rem 1rem 0 0
		  }
		}
		.cas-modal-backdrop {
		  position: fixed;
		  top: 0;
		  bottom: 0;
		  right: 0;
		  left: 0;
		  background-color: #313131;
		  opacity: .85;
		  z-index: 1040
		}

		.cas-modal-outer-wrapper {
		  height: 100%;
		  width: 100%
		}
		.cas-main-container .cas-content-container .cas-content-area {
		  -ms-flex: 1 1 auto;
		  flex: 1 1 auto;
		  overflow-y: auto;
		  -webkit-overflow-scrolling: touch;
		  padding: 1rem;
		}

		.cas-main-container .cas-content-container .cas-content-area>:first-child {
		  margin-top: 0
		}

		.cas-main-container .cas-content-container .cas-sidenav {
		  overflow: hidden
		}

		.cas-main-container .cas-content-container .cas-clr-vertical-nav,
		.cas-main-container .cas-content-container .cas-sidenav {
		  -ms-flex: 0 0 auto;
		  flex: 0 0 auto;
		  -ms-flex-order: -1;
		  order: -1
		}

		.cas-content-area {
		  padding: 1.1rem;
		  padding-bottom: 0px;
		}
		/*---pagination*/
		.cas-datagrid-foot .cas-pagination,
		.cas-datagrid-placeholder.datagrid-empty {
		  display: -ms-flexbox;
		  display: flex;
		  -ms-flex-align: center;
		  align-items: center
		}

		.cas-datagrid-foot .cas-pagination-description {
		  margin-left: 20px;
		  white-space: nowrap
		}

		.cas-datagrid-foot .cas-pagination-list {
		  margin-left: 1.5rem;
		  height: calc(1.5rem - 2px)
		}
		.cas-pagination-list {
		  list-style: none;
		  display: -ms-flexbox;
		  display: flex;
		  -ms-flex-flow: row nowrap;
		  flex-flow: row nowrap;
		  -ms-flex-pack: center;
		  justify-content: center;
		  -ms-flex-align: center;
		  align-items: center;
		}

		.cas-pagination-list>* {
		  padding: 0 .1rem;
		  margin-left: .3rem
		}

		.cas-pagination-list>:first-child {
		  margin-left: 0
		}

		.cas-pagination-list .cas-pagination-current {
		  font-weight: 600;
		  border-bottom: 2px solid #007cbb
		}



		.cas-pagination-list .cas-pagination-previous {
		  margin-right: .25rem;
		}

		.cas-pagination-list .cas-pagination-next {
		  margin-left: .25rem;
		}

		.cas-pagination-list button {
		  -webkit-appearance: none;
		  -moz-appearance: none;
		  -ms-appearance: none;
		  -o-appearance: none;
		  margin: 0;
		  padding: 0;
		  border: 0;
		  border-radius: 0;
		  box-shadow: none;
		  background: 0 0;
		  color: #737373;
		  cursor: pointer
		}


		.cas-pagination-list .cas-pagination-current {
		  background: #fff;
		  border: 1px solid #ccc;
		  border-radius: .125rem;
		  line-height: 1rem;
		  font-size: .45833rem;
		  min-width: 1rem;
		  text-align: center;
		  transition: none!important;
		}
		/*--./pagination-----*/
		/*---------------------------------headings-----------*/
		h1{
		  color: #000;
		}

		h1 {
		  font-size: 2em;
		  margin: .67em 0;
		  font-weight: 300;
		  font-family: "metropolis", Arial, sans-serif !important;
		  font-size: 1.333333rem;
		  letter-spacing: normal;
		  line-height: 2rem;
		  margin-top: 1rem;
		  margin-bottom: 0;
		}

		h2,
		h3,
		h4 {
		  font-weight: 300;
		}

		h2,
		h3,
		h4,
		h5 {
		  margin-bottom: 0;
		  margin-top: 1rem;
		}

		h2,
		h3,
		h4,
		h5 {
		  color: #000;
		  font-family: "metropolis", Arial, sans-serif;
		  font-size: 1.166667rem;
		  letter-spacing: normal;
		  line-height: 2rem
		}

		h3,
		h4,
		h5 {
		  font-size: .916667rem;
		  line-height: 1rem
		}

		h4,
		h5 {
		  font-size: .75rem
		}

		h5 {
		  color: #565656;
		  font-weight: 400;
		  font-size: .666667rem;
		  letter-spacing: .01em
		}
		/*---------------------------------end of headings--------------*/
		.cas-clr-timeline {
		  display: -webkit-box;
		  display: -ms-flexbox;
		  display: flex;
		  padding: 0.5rem;
		}

		.cas-clr-timeline-step {
		  display: -webkit-box;
		  display: -ms-flexbox;
		  display: flex;
		  -webkit-box-orient: vertical;
		  -webkit-box-direction: normal;
		  -ms-flex-direction: column;
		  flex-direction: column;
		  width: 100%;
		  min-width: 7.291667rem;
		  margin-left: 0.5rem;
		}
		.cas-clr-timeline-step clr-icon {
		  width: 1.5rem;
		  height: 1.5rem;
		  min-width: 1.5rem;
		  min-height: 1.5rem;
		}
		.cas-clr-timeline-step clr-icon[shape=circle] {
		  color: #737373;
		}
		.cas-clr-timeline-step clr-icon[shape=dot-circle] {
		  color: #0077b8;
		}
		.cas-clr-timeline-step clr-icon[shape=success-standard] {
		  color: #61b715;
		}
		.cas-clr-timeline-step clr-icon[shape=error-standard] {
		  color: #c72100;
		}
		.cas-clr-timeline-step:not(:last-of-type) .cas-clr-timeline-step-body::before {
		  content: "";
		  background: #999999;
		  height: 0.083333rem;
		  width: calc( 100% - (1.5rem - 2 * 0.083333rem) + 0.5rem );
		  -webkit-transform: translate(1.416667rem, -0.7916665rem);
		  transform: translate(1.416667rem, -0.7916665rem);
		}

		.cas-clr-timeline-step-header {
		  color: #737373;
		  font-size: 0.541667rem;
		  line-height: 0.75rem;
		  white-space: nowrap;
		  margin-bottom: 0.333333rem;
		}

		.cas-clr-timeline-step-body {
		  display: -webkit-box;
		  display: -ms-flexbox;
		  display: flex;
		  -webkit-box-orient: vertical;
		  -webkit-box-direction: normal;
		  -ms-flex-direction: column;
		  flex-direction: column;
		}

		.cas-clr-timeline-step-title {
		  color: #575757;
		  font-size: 0.541667rem;
		  font-weight: 500;
		  line-height: 0.75rem;
		  margin-top: 0.333333rem;
		  margin-bottom: 0.25rem;
		}

		.cas-clr-timeline-step-description {
		  color: #575757;
		  font-size: 0.458333rem;
		  line-height: 0.66667rem;
		}
		.cas-clr-timeline-step-description button {
		  display: block;
		  margin-top: 0.333333rem;
		}
		.cas-clr-timeline-step-description img {
		  width: 100%;
		  margin-top: 0.333333rem;
		}

		.cas-clr-timeline.cas-clr-timeline-vertical {
		  -webkit-box-orient: vertical;
		  -webkit-box-direction: normal;
		  -ms-flex-direction: column;
		  flex-direction: column;
		  min-width: 13.33333rem;
		}
		.cas-clr-timeline.cas-clr-timeline-vertical .cas-clr-timeline-step {
		  -webkit-box-orient: horizontal;
		  -webkit-box-direction: normal;
		  -ms-flex-direction: row;
		  flex-direction: row;
		  margin-left: 0;
		  position: relative;
		  /* required for vertical line to get 100% height of step body it belongs to */
		}
		.cas-clr-timeline.cas-clr-timeline-vertical .cas-clr-timeline-step:not(:last-of-type) {
		  margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
		}
		.cas-clr-timeline.cas-clr-timeline-vertical .cas-clr-timeline-step:not(:last-of-type) .cas-clr-timeline-step-body::before {
		  position: absolute;
		  width: 0.083333rem;
		  height: calc(100% + 2 * 0.083333rem);
		  -webkit-transform: translate(-1.2916665rem, 1.166667rem);
		  transform: translate(-1.2916665rem, 1.166667rem);
		}
		.cas-clr-timeline.cas-clr-timeline-vertical .cas-clr-timeline-step-header {
		  text-align: right;
		  white-space: normal;
		  word-break: break-word;
		  width: 2.5rem;
		  min-width: 2.5rem;
		  margin-right: 0.5rem;
		  margin-top: 0.25rem;
		  margin-bottom: 0;
		}
		.cas-clr-timeline.cas-clr-timeline-vertical .cas-clr-timeline-step-title {
		  margin-top: 0;
		}
		.cas-clr-timeline.cas-clr-timeline-vertical .cas-clr-timeline-step-body {
		  display: -webkit-box;
		  display: -ms-flexbox;
		  display: flex;
		  -webkit-box-orient: vertical;
		  -webkit-box-direction: normal;
		  -ms-flex-direction: column;
		  flex-direction: column;
		  min-width: 7.333333rem;
		  margin-left: 0.5rem;
		  margin-top: 0.25rem;
		}
		/*------------------------------row-column-----*/
		.cas-clr-row {
		  display: -ms-flexbox;
		  display: flex;
		  -ms-flex-wrap: wrap;
		  flex-wrap: wrap;
		  margin-right: -.5rem;
		  margin-left: -.5rem
		}
		.cas-clr-col,
		.cas-clr-col-1,
		.cas-clr-col-10,
		.cas-clr-col-11,
		.cas-clr-col-12,
		.cas-clr-col-2,
		.cas-clr-col-3,
		.cas-clr-col-4,
		.cas-clr-col-5,
		.cas-clr-col-6,
		.cas-clr-col-7,
		.cas-clr-col-8,
		.cas-clr-col-9 {
		  width: 100%;
		  min-height: 1px;
		  padding-right: .5rem;
		  padding-left: .5rem
		}
		.cas-clr-col-1 {
		  -ms-flex: 0 0 8.333333%;
		  flex: 0 0 8.333333%;
		  max-width: 8.333333%
		}

		.cas-clr-col-2 {
		  -ms-flex: 0 0 16.666667%;
		  flex: 0 0 16.666667%;
		  max-width: 16.666667%
		}

		.cas-clr-col-3 {
		  -ms-flex: 0 0 25%;
		  flex: 0 0 25%;
		  max-width: 25%
		}

		.cas-clr-col-4 {
		  -ms-flex: 0 0 33.333333%;
		  flex: 0 0 33.333333%;
		  max-width: 33.333333%
		}

		.cas-clr-col-5 {
		  -ms-flex: 0 0 41.666667%;
		  flex: 0 0 41.666667%;
		  max-width: 41.666667%
		}

		.cas-clr-col-6 {
		  -ms-flex: 0 0 50%;
		  flex: 0 0 50%;
		  max-width: 50%
		}

		.cas-clr-col-7 {
		  -ms-flex: 0 0 58.333333%;
		  flex: 0 0 58.333333%;
		  max-width: 58.333333%
		}

		.cas-clr-col-8 {
		  -ms-flex: 0 0 66.666667%;
		  flex: 0 0 66.666667%;
		  max-width: 66.666667%
		}

		.cas-clr-col-9 {
		  -ms-flex: 0 0 75%;
		  flex: 0 0 75%;
		  max-width: 75%
		}

		.cas-clr-col-10 {
		  -ms-flex: 0 0 83.333333%;
		  flex: 0 0 83.333333%;
		  max-width: 83.333333%
		}

		.cas-clr-col-11 {
		  -ms-flex: 0 0 91.666667%;
		  flex: 0 0 91.666667%;
		  max-width: 91.666667%
		}

		.cas-clr-col-12 {
		  -ms-flex: 0 0 100%;
		  flex: 0 0 100%;
		  max-width: 100%
		}
		/*-------------------------------row-column ends here----------*/
		/*-----------------------------------tooltip----------------------------*/
		.cas-tooltip {
		  display: inline-block;
		  position: relative;
		  text-align: left;
		  overflow: visible
		}

		.cas-tooltip>.cas-tooltip-content {
		  visibility: hidden;
		  opacity: 0;
		  transition: opacity .3s linear;
		  white-space: normal;
		  z-index: 1070
		}

		.cas-tooltip:hover {
		  background: url(data:image/svg+xml;charset=UTF-8,%3Csvg+xmlns%3D%22http%3A//www.cas-w3.cas-org/2000/svg%22+width%3D%221%22+height%3D%221%22+viewBox%3D%220+0+1+1%22%3E%3Ctitle%3Etransparent+bcg%3C/title%3E%3C/svg%3E)
		}

		.cas-tooltip:focus>.cas-tooltip-content,
		.cas-tooltip:hover>.cas-tooltip-content {
		  visibility: visible;

		  padding-bottom: 0;
		  text-align: right;
		}

		.cas-datagrid-foot{
			display:inline-block;
		}

		.datagrid-footer-description{
			display:inline-flex;
		  text-align: right;
		
		}

		.cas-clr-input.ng-touched.ng-invalid{
		  border-bottom:1px solid #c92100;
		}

		.cas-clr-subtext {
		  display: block;
		  font-size: 1.2rem;
		  line-height: 2rem;
		  color: #c92100;
		  margin-top: 0rem;
		}

		.info-error{
		  svg{
			fill:#c92100;
		  }
		}

		.cas-alert.cas-alert-danger {
		  background: #f5dddb;
		  color: #575757;
		  border: 1px solid #f8b5b4;
		}

		.cas-alert {
		  font-size: .541667rem;
		  letter-spacing: normal;
		  line-height: .75rem;
		  position: relative;
		  box-sizing: border-box;
		  display: flex;
		  flex-direction: row;
		  width: auto;
		  border-radius: .125rem;
		  margin-top: .25rem;
		  background: #e0f0f6;
		  color: #575757;
		  border: 1px solid #45afd9;
		}

		.cas-alert-text {
		  font-size: .541667rem;
		  letter-spacing: normal;
		  line-height: .75rem;
		  display: inline-block;
		  flex-grow: 1;
		  flex-shrink: 1;
		  flex-basis: 98%;
		  max-width: 98%;
		  margin-right: .5rem;
		  text-align: left;
		  padding-top: 5px;
		}

		.cas-alert-item {
		  display: flex;
		  flex-wrap: nowrap;
		  flex-basis: 100%;
		  min-height: .75rem;
		  padding: .2rem;
		}

		.cas-alert-item:last-child {
		  margin-bottom: 0;
		}

		.cas-alert-icon-wrapper {
		  flex: 0 0 1.04166667rem;
		  align-self: start;
		  padding-top: .04166667rem;
		  height: .75rem;
		}

		.cas-clr-form-control{
		  flex-direction: row;
		}

		.form-wrapper-single-container{
		  margin-top:0;
		  overflow-y:auto;
		  height:calc(100vh - 240px);
		}


		.form-wrapper-multiple-container{
		  margin-top:0;
		  overflow-y:auto;
		  height:calc(100vh - 280px);
		}
		
		.cas-clr-col-12{
		  padding-left:0.2rem !important;
		  padding-right:0.2rem !important;
		  margin-bottom:10px;
		}

		.angle-down{
		position: relative;
			right: 20px;
		}

		.cas-clr-checkbox-wrapper {
			position: relative
		}

		.cas-clr-checkbox-wrapper .cas-clr-control-label {
			font-weight: 400;
			display: block
		}

		.cas-clr-checkbox-wrapper~.cas-clr-validate-icon {
			margin-left: 0
		}

		.cas-clr-checkbox-wrapper~.cas-clr-subtext {
			display: inline-block
		}

		.cas-clr-checkbox-wrapper input[type=checkbox],.cas-clr-radio-wrapper input[type=radio] {
			position: absolute;
			opacity: 0;
			top: .25rem;
			left: 0;
			height: .8rem;
			width: .8rem
		}

		.cas-clr-checkbox-wrapper label {
			position: relative;
			display: inline-block;
			min-height: 1.2rem;
			padding-left: 1.1rem;
			margin-top: 0;
			cursor: pointer;
			line-height: 1.2rem;
			color: #000;
			color: var(--cas-clr-forms-checkbox-label-color,#000)
		}

		.cas-clr-checkbox-wrapper input[type=checkbox]+label::before {
			position: absolute;
			top: -0.9rem;
			left: 0%;
			content: "";
			display: inline-block;
			height: 1.5rem;
			width: 1.5rem;
			border: .05rem solid #b3b3b3;
			border-color: var(--cas-clr-forms-border-color,#b3b3b3);
			border-radius: .35rem;
		}

		.cas-clr-checkbox-wrapper input[type=checkbox]+label::after {
			position: absolute;
			content: "";
			display: none;
			height: .6rem;
			width: 1rem;
			border-left: .1rem solid;
			border-bottom: .1rem solid;
			border-color: #fff;
			border-color: var(--cas-clr-forms-checkbox-mark-color,#fff);
			top: -0.9rem;
			left: 1.5%;
			-webkit-transform: translate(0,.2rem) rotate(-45deg);
			transform: translate(0,.2rem) rotate(-45deg)
		}

		.cas-clr-checkbox-wrapper input[type=checkbox]:checked+label::before {
			background: #0088c2;
			background: var(--cas-clr-forms-checkbox-background-color,#0088c2);
			border: 0
		}

		.cas-clr-checkbox-wrapper input[type=checkbox]:checked+label::after {
			display: inline-block
		}

		.cas-clr-checkbox-wrapper input[type=checkbox].cas-clr-indeterminate+label::before,.cas-clr-checkbox-wrapper input[type=checkbox]:indeterminate+label::before {
			border: .05rem solid #0088c2;
			border-color: var(--cas-clr-forms-checkbox-indeterminate-border-color,#0088c2)
		}

		.cas-clr-checkbox-wrapper input[type=checkbox].cas-clr-indeterminate+label::after,.cas-clr-checkbox-wrapper input[type=checkbox]:indeterminate+label::after {
			border-left: none;
			border-bottom-color: #0088c2;
			border-bottom-color: var(--cas-clr-forms-checkbox-indeterminate-border-color,#0088c2);
			display: inline-block;
			-webkit-transform: translate(0,.2rem);
			transform: translate(0,.2rem)
		}

		.cas-clr-checkbox-wrapper.cas-clr-checkbox-inline {
			display: flex;
			flex-wrap: wrap;
			align-content: flex-start
		}

		.cas-clr-checkbox-wrapper.cas-clr-checkbox-inline .cas-clr-control-label {
			display: inline-block;
			margin-right: .6rem;
			width: auto
		}

		.cas-clr-error .cas-clr-checkbox-wrapper input[type=checkbox]+label::before {
			border-color: #c21d00;
			border-color: var(--cas-clr-forms-invalid-color,#c21d00)
		}

		.cas-clr-form-control-disabled .cas-clr-checkbox-wrapper label {
			cursor: not-allowed
		}

		.cas-clr-form-control-disabled .cas-clr-checkbox-wrapper input[type=checkbox]+label::before,.cas-clr-form-control-disabled .cas-clr-checkbox-wrapper input[type=checkbox]:checked+label::before {
			background-color: #ccc;
			background-color: var(--cas-clr-forms-checkbox-disabled-background-color,#ccc);
			border: 0
		}

		.cas-clr-form-control-disabled .cas-clr-checkbox-wrapper input[type=checkbox]:checked+label::after {
			border-left: .1rem solid #000;
			border-bottom: .1rem solid #000;
			border-left-color: var(--cas-clr-forms-checkbox-disabled-mark-color,#000);
			border-bottom-color: var(--cas-clr-forms-checkbox-disabled-mark-color,#000)
		}

		.cas-clr-form-control-disabled .cas-clr-checkbox-wrapper input[type=checkbox]:checked.cas-clr-indeterminate+label::after,.cas-clr-form-control-disabled .cas-clr-checkbox-wrapper input[type=checkbox]:checked:indeterminate+label::after {
			border-left: none
		}

		.cas-clr-form-compact .cas-clr-checkbox-wrapper {
			max-width: 100%;
			display: flex;
			flex-wrap: wrap;
			align-content: flex-start;
			height: 1.2rem
		}

		.cas-clr-form-compact .cas-clr-checkbox-wrapper~.cas-clr-subtext {
			margin-left: .3rem
		}

		.cas-clr-form-compact .cas-clr-checkbox-wrapper .cas-clr-control-label {
			display: inline-block;
			margin-right: .6rem;
			width: auto;
			margin-top: 0
		}


	</style>
	<div id="daragrid${jellyCount}" ng-controller="AngularAppCtrl">
		<div class="myWidget" >
			<div> 
				<span class="cursor-class primary-color-clr" ng-click="addRow();"  ng-if="!inputJSON.read_only" onclick=""><svg version="1.1" width="16" height="16"  viewBox="0 0 36 36" preserveAspectRatio="xMidYMid meet" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink"><path d="M34,18A16,16,0,1,1,18,2,16,16,0,0,1,34,18Zm-8.41-1.5H19.5V10.41a1.5,1.5,0,0,0-3,0V16.5H10.41a1.5,1.5,0,0,0,0,3H16.5v6.09a1.5,1.5,0,0,0,3,0V19.5h6.09a1.5,1.5,0,0,0,0-3Z" class="clr-i-solid clr-i-solid-path-1"></path><rect x="0" y="0" width="16" height="16" fill-opacity="0"/></svg>
				</span>
				<div class="cas-clr-row" style="width:100%">
					
					<div class="cas-clr-col-12">
						<div class="scrollit" id="{{inputJSON.name+'__table'}}">
						<table class="cas-table" style="margin-top: 0rem;border:0px">
							<thead>
								<tr>
								<th ng-if="!inputJSON.read_only" style="width: 25px !important;"></th>
								<th ng-if="!inputJSON.read_only" style="width: 25px !important;"></th>
								<th style="width: 3.5rem !important;height: 50px;" ng-repeat="header in tableHeaders">{{header.label}}</th>
								</tr>
							</thead>
							<tbody>
								<tr ng-repeat="tag in paginatedArr track by $index" ng-init="rowIndex = $index;">
									<td ng-if="!inputJSON.read_only" class="left" style="width: 25px !important;">
										<span class="cursor-class primary-color-clr" ng-click="deleteRow(paginatedArr,rowIndex);"><svg version="1.1" width="16" height="16"  viewBox="0 0 36 36" preserveAspectRatio="xMidYMid meet" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink"><path d="M18,2A16,16,0,1,0,34,18,16,16,0,0,0,18,2Zm6,17.5H12a1.5,1.5,0,0,1,0-3H24a1.5,1.5,0,0,1,0,3Z" class="clr-i-solid clr-i-solid-path-1"></path><rect x="0" y="0" width="16" height="16" fill-opacity="0"/></svg></span>              
									</td>
									<td ng-if="!inputJSON.read_only" class="left" style="width: 25px !important;"> 
										<span class="cursor-class primary-color-clr" id="{{'edit'+rowIndex}}" style="display:block" ng-click="editRow(paginatedArr, tag,rowIndex);updateJSON();"><svg version="1.1" width="16" height="16"  viewBox="0 0 36 36" preserveAspectRatio="xMidYMid meet" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink"><path class="clr-i-solid clr-i-solid-path-1" d="M4.22,23.2l-1.9,8.2a2.06,2.06,0,0,0,2,2.5,2.14,2.14,0,0,0,.43,0L13,32,28.84,16.22,20,7.4Z"></path><path class="clr-i-solid clr-i-solid-path-2" d="M33.82,8.32l-5.9-5.9a2.07,2.07,0,0,0-2.92,0L21.72,5.7l8.83,8.83,3.28-3.28A2.07,2.07,0,0,0,33.82,8.32Z"></path><rect x="0" y="0" width="16" height="16" fill-opacity="0"/></svg></span>              
									</td>
									<td class="left wdg-table-name" style="width: 3.5rem !important;height: 50px;overflow-wrap: break-word;" title="" ng-repeat="header in tableHeaders">
										<div id="{{header.id+rowIndex}}" style="display:block" >
										<div ng-if="header.type.dataType == 'string'">{{tag[header.id]}}</div>
										<div ng-if="header.type.dataType == 'integer'">{{tag[header.id]}}</div>
										<div ng-if="header.type.dataType == 'decimal'">{{tag[header.id]}}</div>
										<div ng-if="header.type.dataType == 'secureString'">{{stringEncryption(tag[header.id],'password')}}</div>
										<div ng-if="header.type.dataType == 'dateTime'">{{stringEncryption(tag[header.id],'date')}}</div>
										<div ng-if="header.type.dataType == 'boolean'">     
											<div class="cas-clr-checkbox-wrapper custom-checkbox-wrapper" style="top:9px; left:20px;">
											<input class="cas-clr-checkbox" ng-disabled="true" type="checkbox" name="{{header.id + rowIndex}}" id="{{header.id + rowIndex}}" ng-model="tag[header.id]" ng-checked="tag[header.id]" /> 
											<label class="cas-clr-control-label" for="{{header.id + rowIndex}}"></label>
											</div>  
										</div>
										</div>
									</td>
								</tr>
							</tbody>
						</table>
							</div>
						<table style="width:100%">
							 <tfoot>
								<tr ng-if="inputJSON.pageSize != '' && renderJSON.length > 0">
								  <td class="pagination-wrapper" id="{{inputJSON.name+'__pagination_footer'}}" style="font-size:1.4rem;text-align:right;border: 1px solid #ccc;padding: 8px;border-radius: .125rem;width:570px;background-color:#fafafa;" colspan="{{tableHeaders.length + 2}}"> 

									<div class="load-more-wrapper" ng-show="paginationObj.itemsArray.length < paginationObj.totalRecords">
									  <div class="cas-btn cas-btn-link wdg-load-more"
										   ng-if="infiniteScroll"
										   ng-click="search(paginationObj.currentRecord + paginationObj.windowSize)">
										Load More
									  </div>
									</div>
									<div class="datagrid-footer-description" style="font-size:1.4rem;display: inline-flex;">  {{(((pageNum - 1)*pageSize) + 1)}} - {{(pageNum * pageSize) > renderJSON.length ? renderJSON.length :(pageNum * pageSize) }} of {{renderJSON.length}}</div>
									<div class="cas-datagrid-foot" ng-if="!infiniteScroll" style="position:relative;top:2px;display: inline-flex;">
									  <div class="cas-pagination-list">
										<span class="cas-pagination-first pagination-btn cursor-class" type="button"
												ng-click="!(pageNum <= 1) && setPaginationArr(1, pageSize, '', 'searchInputId_'+inputJSON.name);changeDisableState('previous');"
												aria-label="First Page">
											<svg version="1.1" width="15" height="15" style="transform:rotateZ(180deg);" viewBox="0 0 36 36" preserveAspectRatio="xMidYMid meet" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" focusable="false" role="img"><path d="M7.08,6.52a1.68,1.68,0,0,0,0,2.4L16.51,18,7.12,27.08a1.7,1.7,0,0,0,2.36,2.44h0L21.4,18,9.48,6.47A1.69,1.69,0,0,0,7.08,6.52Z" class="clr-i-outline clr-i-outline-path-1"></path><path d="M26.49,5a1.7,1.7,0,0,0-1.7,1.7V29.3a1.7,1.7,0,0,0,3.4,0V6.7A1.7,1.7,0,0,0,26.49,5Z" class="clr-i-outline clr-i-outline-path-2"></path></svg>
										  </span>
										<span class="cas-pagination-previous pagination-btn cursor-class" 
												ng-click="!(pageNum <= 1) && setPaginationArr(pageNum, pageSize, 'previous', 'searchInputId_'+inputJSON.name);changeDisableState('previous');"
												type="button"
												aria-label="Previous Page">
											<svg version="1.1" width="15" height="15" style="transform:rotateZ(-90deg);" viewBox="0 0 36 36" preserveAspectRatio="xMidYMid meet" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink"><path class="clr-i-outline clr-i-outline-path-1" d="M29.52,22.52,18,10.6,6.48,22.52a1.7,1.7,0,0,0,2.45,2.36L18,15.49l9.08,9.39a1.7,1.7,0,0,0,2.45-2.36Z"></path></svg>
										</span>
										<div style="position:relative;top:-1.5px;">
											<input class="cas-pagination-current cas-clr-input" 
												   type="text" 
												   value="1"
												   style="font-size:1.25rem;margin-right:5px;margin-left:5px;"
												   id="{{'searchInputId_'+inputJSON.name}}"
												   ng-keypress="$event.keyCode == 13 && setPaginationArr(pageNum, pageSize, 'search', 'searchInputId_'+inputJSON.name)" 
												   ng-blur="setPaginationArr(pageNum, pageSize, 'search', 'searchInputId_'+inputJSON.name)" 
												   size='2' 
												   aria-label="Current Page" /> /
											<span aria-label="Total Pages" style="margin-right:5px;margin-left:5px;">{{totalSegment}}</span>
										</div>
										<span class="cas-pagination-next pagination-btn cursor-class" type="button"
												ng-click="!(pageNum >= totalSegment) && setPaginationArr(pageNum, pageSize, 'next', 'searchInputId_'+inputJSON.name);changeDisableState('next');"
												aria-label="Next Page">
											<svg version="1.1" width="15" height="15" style="transform:rotateZ(90deg);" viewBox="0 0 36 36" preserveAspectRatio="xMidYMid meet" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink"><path class="clr-i-outline clr-i-outline-path-1" d="M29.52,22.52,18,10.6,6.48,22.52a1.7,1.7,0,0,0,2.45,2.36L18,15.49l9.08,9.39a1.7,1.7,0,0,0,2.45-2.36Z"></path></svg>
										  </span>
										<span class="cas-pagination-last pagination-btn cursor-class" 
												type="button"  
												ng-click="!(pageNum >= totalSegment) && setPaginationArr(totalSegment, pageSize, '', 'searchInputId_'+inputJSON.name);changeDisableState('next');"
												aria-label="Last Page">
												<svg version="1.1" width="15" height="15" viewBox="0 0 36 36" preserveAspectRatio="xMidYMid meet" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" focusable="false" role="img"><path d="M7.08,6.52a1.68,1.68,0,0,0,0,2.4L16.51,18,7.12,27.08a1.7,1.7,0,0,0,2.36,2.44h0L21.4,18,9.48,6.47A1.69,1.69,0,0,0,7.08,6.52Z" class="clr-i-outline clr-i-outline-path-1"></path><path d="M26.49,5a1.7,1.7,0,0,0-1.7,1.7V29.3a1.7,1.7,0,0,0,3.4,0V6.7A1.7,1.7,0,0,0,26.49,5Z" class="clr-i-outline clr-i-outline-path-2"></path></svg>
										  </span>
									  </div>
									</div>

								  </td>
								</tr>
								 
								<tr ng-if="inputJSON.pageSize == '' && renderJSON.length > 0">
									
								  <td class="pagination-wrapper" id="{{inputJSON.name+'__simple_footer'}}"  style="font-size:1.4rem;text-align:right;border: 1px solid #ccc;padding: 8px;border-radius: .125rem;width:570px;background-color:#fafafa;" colspan="{{tableHeaders.length + 2}}"> 
									<div class="datagrid-footer-description" style="display: inline-flex;">  1 - {{renderJSON.length}} of {{renderJSON.length}}</div>
								  </td>
									
								</tr>
							  </tfoot>
						</table>
						<div ng-if="(renderJSON.length == 0) && loader && (inputJSON.defaultClientScript != '')" class="onload-loader">
						  Loading
							<span>.</span>
							<span>.</span>
							<span>.</span>

						</div> 
					</div>
				</div> 
			</div>
			
			<!-- datagrid modal -->
			 <div class="cas-modal action-modal-datagrid" id="{{inputJSON.name}}__model" style="display: none">
				<div class="cas-modal-dialog" role="dialog" aria-hidden="true">
				  <div class="cas-modal-content">
					<div class="cas-modal-header">
					  <span aria-label="Close" class="cas-close cursor-class" type="button"  ng-click="reason='';closeDataGridModel();" onclick="">
						<svg version="1.1" width="25" height="25"  viewBox="0 0 36 36" preserveAspectRatio="xMidYMid meet" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink"><path class="clr-i-outline clr-i-outline-path-1" d="M19.41,18l8.29-8.29a1,1,0,0,0-1.41-1.41L18,16.59,9.71,8.29A1,1,0,0,0,8.29,9.71L16.59,18,8.29,26.29a1,1,0,1,0,1.41,1.41L18,19.41l8.29,8.29a1,1,0,0,0,1.41-1.41Z"></path><rect x="0" y="0" width="25" height="25" fill-opacity="0"/></svg>
						</span>
					  <h3 class="cas-modal-title">{{inputJSON.display_name}}</h3>
					</div>
					<ng-form name='datagridForm' class="cas-clr-form cas-clr-form-horizontal" >
					<div class="cas-modal-body"> 

						<div  ng-repeat="field in fields_arr" >            
						  <div class="cas-clr-form-control" >
							  <div >
								  <label for="{{field.fieldId}}" class="cas-clr-control-label cas-clr-col-12 cas-clr-col-md-2 labelflex">{{field.display_name}}<span ng-if="field.mandatory== true" style="color:red;margin-left:5px;">*</span></label>
							  </div>
							  
							  <!--Single Line Text-->
							  <div class="cas-clr-control-container  cas-clr-col-12 cas-clr-col-md-5 contentflex" ng-if="field.type==6 && field.field_type!='number'" ng-class="{'cas-clr-error':(!(submitted && datagridForm.$valid) && datagridForm[field.fieldId].$invalid && (datagridForm[field.fieldId].$touched ||datagridForm.$submitted ) && field.mandatory=='true')}" >
								  <div class="cas-clr-input-wrapper">
									  <input type="{{field.field_type}}" ng-min="{{(field.scale_min && field.field_type!='text')?field.scale_min:''}}" ng-max="{{(field.scale_max && field.field_type!='text')?field.scale_max:''}}" ng-minlength="{{(field.scale_min && field.field_type=='text')?field.scale_min:''}}" ng-maxlength="{{(field.scale_min && field.field_type=='text')?field.scale_max:''}}"  ng-pattern="setRegex(field.pattern)" name="{{field.fieldId}}" ng-disabled="field.read_only" ng-required="field.mandatory"  id="{{field.fieldId}}" ng-model="field.value" ng-change="updateDatagridAnswer(field.name,field.value,field.field_type,field)" placeholder="{{field.help_text}}" value="{{field.default_value}}" class="cas-clr-input fullwidth"  />
									  <span ng-show="(datagridForm[field.fieldId].$touched || datagridForm.$submitted) && datagridForm[field.fieldId].$invalid && field.mandatory  && !(datagridForm[field.fieldId].$error.maxlength || datagridForm[field.fieldId].$error.minlength ) && !(datagridForm[field.fieldId].$error.pattern)" class="cas-clr-subtext">Field is mandatory</span>
									  <span ng-show="(field.field_type=='number'||field.field_type=='text') && datagridForm[field.fieldId].$invalid   && ((datagridForm[field.fieldId].$error.max && field.field_type=='number') ||(datagridForm[field.fieldId].$error.maxlength && field.field_type!='number')) && field.scale_max"   class="cas-clr-subtext">Max {{(field.field_type=='number')?'Value':'Length'}} should be {{field.scale_max}}</span>
									  <span ng-show="(field.field_type=='number'||field.field_type=='text') && datagridForm[field.fieldId].$invalid && ((datagridForm[field.fieldId].$error.min && field.field_type=='number') ||(datagridForm[field.fieldId].$error.minlength && field.field_type!='number')) && field.scale_min" class="cas-clr-subtext">Min {{(field.field_type=='number')?'Value':'Length'}} should be {{field.scale_min}}</span>
									  <span ng-show="datagridForm[field.fieldId].$error.pattern"  class="cas-clr-subtext">{{(field.pattern_msg)?field.pattern_msg:'Invalid Input!'}}</span> 
								  </div>
							  </div>
							  
							  <!--Numeric Fields--> 
								<div class="cas-clr-control-container  cas-clr-col-12 cas-clr-col-md-5 contentflex" ng-if="field.type==6 && field.field_type=='number'" ng-class="{'cas-clr-error':(!(c.data.submitted && datagridForm.$valid) && datagridForm[field.fieldId].$invalid && (datagridForm[field.fieldId].$touched ||datagridForm.$submitted ) && field.mandatory=='true')}" >
								<div class="cas-clr-input-wrapper">
									<input type="{{field.field_type}}" ng-if="field.datatype!='Decimal'" ng-min="{{(field.scale_min)?field.scale_min:''}}" ng-max="{{(field.scale_max)?field.scale_max:''}}" ng-pattern="setRegex(field.pattern)" name="{{field.fieldId}}" ng-disabled="field.read_only" ng-required="field.mandatory"  step="{{field.steps}}" id="{{field.fieldId}}" ng-model="field.value"  ng-change="updateDatagridAnswer(field.name,field.value,field.field_type,field)" placeholder="{{field.help_text}}" value="{{field.default_value}}" class="cas-clr-input fullwidth" onkeypress="validateInteger(event);" />
									<input type="{{field.field_type}}" ng-if="field.datatype=='Decimal'" ng-min="{{(field.scale_min)?field.scale_min:''}}" ng-max="{{(field.scale_max)?field.scale_max:''}}" ng-pattern="setRegex(field.pattern)" name="{{field.fieldId}}" ng-disabled="field.read_only" ng-required="field.mandatory"  step="{{field.steps}}" id="{{field.fieldId}}" ng-model="field.value" ng-change="updateDatagridAnswer(field.name,field.value,field.field_type,field)" placeholder="{{field.help_text}}" value="{{field.default_value}}" class="cas-clr-input fullwidth" />
									<span ng-show="(datagridForm[field.fieldId].$touched || datagridForm.$submitted) && datagridForm[field.fieldId].$invalid && field.mandatory  &&!(datagridForm[field.fieldId].$error.maxlength || datagridForm[field.fieldId].$error.minlength ) && !(datagridForm[field.fieldId].$error.pattern)" class="cas-clr-subtext">Field is mandatory</span>
									<span ng-show="(field.field_type=='number'||field.field_type=='text') && datagridForm[field.fieldId].$invalid   && ((datagridForm[field.fieldId].$error.max && field.field_type=='number') ||(datagridForm[field.fieldId].$error.maxlength && field.field_type!='number')) && field.scale_max"   class="cas-clr-subtext">Max {{(field.field_type=='number')?'Value':'Length'}} should be {{field.scale_max}}</span>
									<span ng-show="(field.field_type=='number'||field.field_type=='text') && datagridForm[field.fieldId].$invalid && ((datagridForm[field.fieldId].$error.min && field.field_type=='number') ||(datagridForm[field.fieldId].$error.minlength && field.field_type!='number')) && field.scale_min" class="cas-clr-subtext">Min {{(field.field_type=='number')?'Value':'Length'}} should be {{field.scale_min}}</span>
									<span ng-show="datagridForm[field.fieldId].$error.pattern"  class="cas-clr-subtext">{{(field.pattern_msg)?field.pattern_msg:'Invalid Input!'}}</span> 
								</div>
								</div>

								<!--Password-->
								<div class="cas-clr-control-container  cas-clr-col-12 cas-clr-col-md-5 contentflex" ng-if="field.type==25" ng-class="{'cas-clr-error':(!(c.data.submitted && datagridForm.$valid) && datagridForm[field.fieldId].$invalid && (datagridForm[field.fieldId].$touched ||datagridForm.$submitted ) && field.mandatory=='true')}" >
								<div class="cas-clr-input-wrapper">
									<input type="{{field.field_type}}" ng-minlength="{{(field.scale_min != 0) ? field.scale_min : ''}}" ng-maxlength="{{(field.scale_max != 0) ? field.scale_max : ''}}" ng-pattern="setRegex(field.pattern)" name="{{field.fieldId}}" ng-disabled="field.read_only" ng-required="field.mandatory"  id="{{field.fieldId}}" ng-model="field.value" ng-change="updateDatagridAnswer(field.name,field.value,field.field_type,field)" placeholder="{{field.help_text}}" value="{{field.default_value}}" class="cas-clr-input fullwidth" />
									<span ng-show="(datagridForm[field.fieldId].$touched || datagridForm.$submitted) && datagridForm[field.fieldId].$invalid && field.mandatory  &&!(datagridForm[field.fieldId].$error.maxlength || datagridForm[field.fieldId].$error.minlength ) && !(datagridForm[field.fieldId].$error.pattern)" class="cas-clr-subtext">Field is mandatory</span>
									<span ng-show="datagridForm[field.fieldId].$error.maxlength"  class="cas-clr-subtext">Max Value of password should be {{field.scale_max}}</span>
									<span ng-show="datagridForm[field.fieldId].$error.minlength" class="cas-clr-subtext">Min Value of password should be {{field.scale_min}}</span>
									<span ng-show="datagridForm[field.fieldId].$error.pattern"  class="cas-clr-subtext">{{(field.pattern_msg)?field.pattern_msg:'Invalid Input!'}}</span> 
								</div>
								</div>

								<!--Date & Time-->
								<div class="cas-clr-control-container cas-clr-col-12 cas-clr-col-md-5 contentflex" ng-if="field.type==10" ng-class="{'cas-clr-error':(!(c.data.submitted && datagridForm.$valid) && datagridForm[field.fieldId].$invalid && (datagridForm[field.fieldId].$touched ||datagridForm.$submitted ) && field.mandatory=='true')}" >
								<!-- <sp-date-picker field="field.value" ng-disabled="field.read_only" name="{{field.fieldId}}" ng-required="field.mandatory"  id="{{field.fieldId}}" ng-model="field.value"  ng-change="updateDatagridAnswer(field.name,field.value,field.field_type,field)" data-date-format="yyyy-mm-dd" sn-include-time="true"></sp-date-picker> 
									    -->
									<div style="position : relative">
										<input id="{{field.fieldId}}" class="form-control datepicker" ng-disabled="field.read_only" ng-required="field.mandatory" name="{{field.fieldId}}" ng-model="field.value" ng-blur="updateAnswer(field)" datetime-picker='true' hour="23" minute='59'/>
										
										<span class="glyphicon glyphicon-calendar" style="position:absolute;top:8px;right:8px;"></span>
									</div>
								<span ng-show="(datagridForm[field.fieldId].$touched || datagridForm.$submitted) && datagridForm[field.fieldId].$invalid && field.mandatory" class="cas-clr-subtext">Field is mandatory</span>
								<span ng-if="dateError" class="cas-clr-subtext">{{dateError}}{{(field.pattern_msg)?', '+field.pattern_msg:''}}</span>
								</div>
											
								<!--Checkbox-->
								<div class="cas-clr-form-control cas-clr-col-12 cas-clr-col-md-5 contentflex" ng-if="field.type==7">
								<div class="cas-clr-control-container">
									<div class="cas-clr-checkbox-wrapper">
									<input class="cas-clr-checkbox" ng-init="field.value = field.value.toString() === 'true'? true : false; updateDatagridAnswer(field.name,field.value,field.field_type,field)" ng-disabled="field.read_only" type="checkbox" name="{{field.fieldId}}" ng-required="field.mandatory"  id="{{field.fieldId}}" ng-model="field.value" placeholder="{{field.help_text}}" ng-checked="field.value" ng-change="updateDatagridAnswer(field.name,field.value,field.field_type,field)"/> 
									<label class="cas-clr-control-label" for="{{field.fieldId}}"></label>
									</div>             
								</div>
								<span ng-show="(datagridForm[field.fieldId].$touched || datagridForm.$submitted) && datagridForm[field.fieldId].$invalid && field.mandatory" class="cas-clr-subtext">Field is mandatory</span> 
								</div>

								<span
											data-toggle="tooltip"
											data-placement="right"
											class="info-error"
											ng-if="(field.tooltip_text || (datagridForm[field.fieldId].$invalid && datagridForm[field.fieldId].$touched)||(datagridForm.$submitted && datagridForm[field.fieldId].$invalid) || (field.is_duallist && (datagridForm[field.fieldId].$touched || datagridForm.$submitted) && field.mandatory && !field.selected_options.length))" 
											title="{{field.tooltip_text}}"  
											ng-class="{'info-error': (!(submitted && datagridForm.$valid) && ((datagridForm[field.fieldId].$invalid && datagridForm[field.fieldId].$touched) || (datagridForm.$submitted && datagridForm[field.fieldId].$invalid)))}"><svg version="1.1" width="20" height="20" viewBox="0 0 36 36" preserveAspectRatio="xMidYMid meet" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" focusable="false" role="img"><circle class="clr-i-outline clr-i-outline-path-1" cx="17.93" cy="11.9" r="1.4"></circle><path class="clr-i-outline clr-i-outline-path-2" d="M21,23H19V15H16a1,1,0,0,0,0,2h1v6H15a1,1,0,1,0,0,2h6a1,1,0,0,0,0-2Z"></path><path class="clr-i-outline clr-i-outline-path-3" d="M18,6A12,12,0,1,0,30,18,12,12,0,0,0,18,6Zm0,22A10,10,0,1,1,28,18,10,10,0,0,1,18,28Z"></path></svg></span>
							
							  
						  </div>
						</div>    
					  </div>  
					</ng-form> 
					<div class="cas-clr-form-control cas-clr-col-12" style="margin-bottom: 0px;display: inherit;">
					  <button type="submit" class="cas-btn cas-btn-primary" ng-disabled="datagridForm.$invalid || (dateError != '')" ng-click="submitChange(datagridForm,edit)" style="border-color:#007cbb;background-color: #007cbb;color:#fff;padding-top:0.5rem;width:7rem;font-size:1.25rem;height:3.7rem;border-radius: 4px;margin-right: 10px;">Apply</button>
					  <a class="cas-btn cas-btn-outline" ng-click="closeDataGridModel();" style="padding-top:0.9rem;width:7rem;font-size:1.25rem;height:3.7rem;border-radius: 4px;">Cancel</a>
					</div>
				  </div>
				 </div>
			  </div>
			  <div class="cas-modal-backdrop action-modal-datagrid-backdrop" id="{{inputJSON.name}}__model_backdrop" aria-hidden="true" style="display: none;"></div>
		</div>
	</div>	
</j:jelly>
